title: Undercover
description: Leslie Trammel, a young and headstrong DEA agent, is a woman who has always prided herself on being able to get the job done. When she receives the make-or-break assignment to infiltrate the Winged Enemy Motorcycle Club, she has a golden opportunity to prove herself to the department. Her target is Jed Turner, vice-president of the club. Leslie thinks she can do the job without getting entangled with the darkly handsome outlaw, but when she has a leg-quaking dream she realizes she may be in too deep.
author: Olivia Ruin
